attribute.name: textType
attribute.description: Type of random text to generate. Either gibberish or lorem

attribute.name: outputTag
attribute.description: Type of HTML to generate. Either p for paragraphs or ul for unordered list. Default value is p

attribute.name: count
attribute.description: Number of paragraphs or items to return

attribute.name: minWords
attribute.description: Minimum number of words to return in each paragraph or item. Default value is 5

attribute.name: maxWords
attribute.description: Maximum number of words to return in each paragraph or item. Default value is 10
